title: Bug 104630 - Column icons not showing up when connecting to Derby database
OB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons are not displayed.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open a new project.
2. Create a new report.
3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source and connect to a Derby database:
   - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
   - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
   - User Name: root
   - Password: root
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset.
5. In the Edit Data Set window, select Query.
6. <Add more specific details about what steps are required to encounter the issue in the dataset editing>
